name: Kommissar Kugelblitz: Vermisst am Mississippi
storyline: Kim, the daughter of a diamond merchant in New Orleans has gone missing. Her father is worried and asks his friend Kommissar Kugelblitz, a privat investigator, to find her. Kugelblitz investigates and meets many people in all New Orleans in order to find Kim.
summary: Kommissar Kugelblitz needs your help! The daughter of a diamond merchant has disappeared without a trace. You and Kugelblitz travel to New Orleans where you have to find the missing person by using clever logic and good observational skills.
